Articles.Content:
I'm looking for a mod (for 1.0.4) that either gives you a sensor package (like B9 did) or has a certain science part that will allow you to slowly gather science over time.

Anyone know any or have the ability to make one?

ScanSat lets you gather science over time, sort of. It is limited, once the scan is done with whole planet you can't get anymore.

Also, there is stock. The Science Lab does this.

ScanSat lets you gather science over time, sort of. It is limited, once the scan is done with whole planet you can't get anymore.

Also, there is stock. The Science Lab does this.

Hmm okay thank you.

Any mods with science packages?

I'm looking for a mod (for 1.0.4) that either gives you a sensor package (like B9 did) or has a certain science part that will allow you to slowly gather science over time.

How about B9? The WIP version from Blowfish's signature works just fine. As for slowly gathering science things you might be interested in, take a look at Station Science and see if that's the kind of thing you are looking for.
